about_the_game:
A beautiful Coloring Book with 52 pages, and four posters with the art from Hidden Cats in Tokyo! Both are PDF files with good resolution for printing or digital painting on your preferred software.

You can get a nice gift for family, friends, or yourself. Just relax, stimulate your creativity, and share your paintings.

Meow, and this is a great way to support us!

Contents:

  • colorbook_HCinTokyo.pdf

  • poster_HCinTokyo_ancient_A0.pdf

  • poster_HCinTokyo_cosplay_A0.pdf

  • poster_HCinTokyo_Downtown_A0.pdf

  • poster_HCinTokyo_videogame_A0.pdf

  • 10 wallpapers (16x9 and ultrawide sizes)

After downloading, get the PDF files in the game directory where it is installed

1 - Go to your library, find the game, and click with the second mouse button.

2 - Click on Properties, Local Files

3 - Click on Browse

This will open the game directory and you'll see the folder called "DLC_Coloring_Book" or something similar.
